overview:
Magic Sauce Media, is a new media consultancy that combines social media, viral marketing, communications, PR and branding all under one roof.

We bring 30+ years of collective experience in direct marketing, market strategy, social media, word-of-mouth, viral marketing, public relations, media, content creation, branding, blogging, advertising and sales, to a new recipe for corporate and product communications that blend traditional and social media strategies.

Offering elements of the traditional, big firm approach, combined with the intimacy and social media wealth of a boutique firm, Magic Sauce Media offers overarching executive-level guidance as its base and is infused and seasoned with creative and powerful messaging and positioning and introductions at the highest levels.

Make no mistake â€“ this is nouvelle cuisine proven branding methods mixed with online community development and management, blogging and blog tours, branding, coaching, viral marketing, and a new approach to integrating video and micro-blogging into the recipe for success.

This is a new approach to marketing, branding, social media and PR needs for companies large and small. The new always-on economy offers a broader yet more personalized public image, where anyone can be an author with a PC or mobile device and a simple push of a button.

Our approach is unique. Partner initiatives like these and an ideology that focuses on aligning you with your vision first, and baking in a brand that reflects that alignment consistently results in a personalized and targeted market position and bold communications strategy that brings in the right components at each stage of your growth.

We are effective because our team is virtual, and includes the smartest, most creative, committed and dynamic people from our global network.

We represent companies in the following areas: emerging technologies, travel, lifestyle, food/wine, education, kids/children, consumer, online music, Web 2.0, social networking, social media, green technology and sustainability and events.

You can become a fan on Facebook at: www.facebook.com/magicsaucemedia and follow along on Twitter @magicsaucemedia. The founder’s blog is at http://www.downtheavenue.com.
